sentence.Network_en: She is a softspoken and slender young girl.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是个话语轻柔、身体羸弱的姑娘.

PerfectNetExp.abs: tasty 好吃的softspoken 说话柔和的dish 一道菜

list.exp: 她是一个说话柔和的女人
list.abs: She is a softspoken woman.她是一个说话柔和的女人。 This is a colloquial expr.

entry.tran: 说话细声细气的;语调柔和的;说话轻柔的
entry.def: Someone who is soft-spoken has a quiet, gentle voice.

example.ex: He was a gentle, soft-spoken intelligent man.
example.tran: 他是一个温文尔雅、语调轻柔、头脑聪明的人。
